title: China Locks Down Tech Hub of Shenzhen as Covid Outbreak Spreads - Yahoo Finance
content: China Locks Down Tech Hub of Shenzhen as Covid Outbreak Spreads  Yahoo Finance
description: (Bloomberg) -- China placed the 17.5 million residents of the southern city of Shenzhen into lockdown for at least a week, spurring a key Apple Inc. supplier to halt production as authorities sought to gain control of a spreading Covid-19 outbreak in the vital technology hub.
